languages.text: {n}Тяжелым рывком женщина вскидывает голову, выныривает из забытья, фокусирует на вас взгляд. Удивительно, но даже в столь плачевном состоянии взгляд ее сохранил самоуверенный блеск, веселость и вкрадчивую проницательность.{/n} "Вы... кто вы... А. Знакомый герб. Фон Валанциус. Не так{mf|ой|ая} уж и удивительн{mf|ый|ая} гость{mf||я}, как могло бы показаться".

{n}With a heavy jerk, the woman raises her head, emerging from oblivion, and focuses her gaze on you. Even in such a wretched state, her eyes still gleam with self-confidence, zest, and subtle shrewdness.{/n} "You... Who are... Ah. That coat of arms rings a bell. Von Valancius. I'm not as surprised to see you as you may think."
languages.original_text: {n}Тяжелым рывком женщина вскидывает голову, выныривает из забытья, фокусирует на вас взгляд. Удивительно, но даже в столь плачевном состоянии взгляд ее сохранил самоуверенный блеск, веселость и вкрадчивую проницательность.{/n} "Вы... кто вы... А. Знакомый герб. Фон Валанциус. Не так{mf|ой|ая} уж и удивительн{mf|ый|ая} гость{mf||я}, как могло бы показаться".

traits.locale_text: {n}With a heavy jerk, the woman raises her head, emerging from oblivion, and focuses her eyes on you. Even in such sorry state, her eyes still gleam with self-confidence, cheerfulness and subtle shrewdness.{/n} "You... Who are... Ah. A familiar crest. Von Valancius. Not such a unique guest one might assume you to be."

{n}With a heavy jerk, the woman raises her head, emerging from oblivion, and focuses her eyes on you. Even in such sorry state, her eyes still gleam with self-confidence, cheerfulness and subtle shrewdness.{/n} "You... Who are... Ah. A familiar crest. Von Valancius. Not such a unique guest one might assume you to be."

{n}With a heavy jerk, the woman raises her head, emerging from oblivion, and fixates her gaze on you. Even in such a wretched state, her eyes still gleam with self-confidence, glee and subtle shrewdness.{/n} "You... Who are... Ah. The crest rings a bell. Von Valancius. Not the unique guest one might assume you to be."

Not the unique guest one might assume you to be."

Even in such a wretched state, her eyes still gleam with self-confidence, zest, and subtle shrewdness.{/n} "You... Who are... Ah. That coat of arms rings a bell. Von Valancius. I'm not as surprised to see you as you may think."

{n}With a heavy jerk, the woman raises her head, emerging from oblivion, and focuses her gaze on you. Even in such a wretched state, her eyes still gleam with self-confidence, zest, and subtle shrewdness.{/n} "You... Who are... Ah. That coat of arms rings a bell. Von Valancius. I'm not as surprised to see you as you may think."

languages.text: {n}Tirée de l'inconscience, la femme relève brusquement la tête et vous fixe du regard. Malgré son état lamentable, ses yeux brillent d'assurance, de fougue et d'une fine sagacité.{/n} « Vous... Qui êtes... Ah, je reconnais ces armoiries. Von Valancius. Je ne suis pas aussi surpris de vous voir que vous ne le pensez. »
languages.original_text: {n}With a heavy jerk, the woman raises her head, emerging from oblivion, and focuses her gaze on you. Even in such a wretched state, her eyes still gleam with self-confidence, zest, and subtle shrewdness.{/n} "You... Who are... Ah. That coat of arms rings a bell. Von Valancius. I'm not as surprised to see you as you may think."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tirée de l'inconscience, la femme relève brusquement la tête et vous fixe du regard. Malgré son état lamentable, ses yeux brillent d'assurance, de joie et d'une fine sagacité.{/n} « Vous... Qui êtes... Ah, je reconnais ces armoiries. Von Valancius. Au vu des circonstances, votre présence ici n'a rien de surprenant. »

languages.text: {n}La mujer, con una fuerte sacudida, levanta la cabeza, aclara la mente y clava su mirada en ti. Incluso en un estado tan miserable, sus ojos siguen brillando con confianza en sí misma, regocijo y sutil astucia.{/n} «¿Quién es... usted? Ah. Me quiere sonar ese escudo de armas. Von Valancius. No me sorprende tanto verle como podría usted esperar».
languages.original_text: {n}With a heavy jerk, the woman raises her head, emerging from oblivion, and focuses her gaze on you. Even in such a wretched state, her eyes still gleam with self-confidence, zest, and subtle shrewdness.{/n} "You... Who are... Ah. That coat of arms rings a bell. Von Valancius. I'm not as surprised to see you as you may think."

traits.locale_text: {n}La mujer, con una fuerte sacudida, levanta la cabeza, aclara la mente y clava su mirada en ti. Incluso en un estado tan miserable, sus ojos siguen brillando con confianza en sí misma, regocijo y sutil astucia.{/n} «¿Quién es... usted? Ah. Me quiere sonar ese emblema. Von Valancius. Pero no es quien parece ser de primeras».

languages.text: {n}那个女人猛地抽搐了一下，抬起头，从无意识中清醒过来。她的目光紧紧地盯着你，即便是在如此凄惨的状况下，她的眼中依然带着自信、欢欣与微妙的精明。{/n}“你……是谁……啊，这个家族纹章我倒是见过……是冯·瓦兰修斯家族的人。老实说，见到你恐怕并不怎么让我意外。”
languages.original_text: {n}With a heavy jerk, the woman raises her head, emerging from oblivion, and focuses her gaze on you. Even in such a wretched state, her eyes still gleam with self-confidence, zest, and subtle shrewdness.{/n} "You... Who are... Ah. That coat of arms rings a bell. Von Valancius. I'm not as surprised to see you as you may think."

traits.locale_text: {n}那个女人猛地抽搐了一下，抬起头，从无意识中清醒过来。她的目光紧紧地盯着你，即便是在如此凄惨的状况下，她的眼中依然带着自信、欢欣与微妙的精明。{/n}“你……是谁……啊，这个家族纹章我倒是见过……是冯·瓦兰修斯家族的人，和我想象的那位特别的客人不太一样。”

languages.text: {n}重い衝撃とともにその女性が頭を上げる。忘却から抜け出したようで、あなたを見つめている。そんな惨めな状態でも、彼女の目は自信と熱意、そして抜け目のない輝きを残していた。{/n}「あんたは…ああ、そうか。紋章でピンときた。フォン・ヴァランシウスか。あんたが思ってるほど、あんたがここにいることに驚いてはいないんだよ」
languages.original_text: {n}With a heavy jerk, the woman raises her head, emerging from oblivion, and focuses her gaze on you. Even in such a wretched state, her eyes still gleam with self-confidence, zest, and subtle shrewdness.{/n} "You... Who are... Ah. That coat of arms rings a bell. Von Valancius. I'm not as surprised to see you as you may think."

traits.locale_text: {n}重い衝撃とともにその女性が頭を上げる。忘却から抜け出したようで、あなたを見つめている。そんな惨めな状態でも、彼女の目は自信と熱意、そして抜け目のない輝きを残していた。{/n}「あんたは…ああ、そうか。紋章でピンときた。フォン・ヴァランシウスか。あんたが思ってるほど、あんたがここにいることに驚いてはいないんだよ」

languages.text: {n}Die Frau hebt mit einem schwerfälligen Rucken den Kopf, taucht aus dem Nichts auf und fixiert dich mit ihrem Blick. Selbst in diesem schrecklichen Zustand leuchten in ihren Augen noch Selbstbewusstsein, Humor und subtiler Scharfsinn.{/n} "Ihr ... Wer seid ... Ah. Das Wappen kommt mir bekannt vor. Von Valancius. Ich bin nicht so überrascht, Euch zu sehen, wie Ihr es glaubt."
languages.original_text: {n}With a heavy jerk, the woman raises her head, emerging from oblivion, and focuses her gaze on you. Even in such a wretched state, her eyes still gleam with self-confidence, zest, and subtle shrewdness.{/n} "You... Who are... Ah. That coat of arms rings a bell. Von Valancius. I'm not as surprised to see you as you may think."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Frau hebt mit einem schwerfälligen Rucken den Kopf, taucht aus dem Nichts auf und fixiert dich mit ihrem Blick. Selbst in diesem schrecklichen Zustand leuchten in ihren Augen noch Selbstbewusstsein, Humor und subtiler Scharfsinn.{/n} "Ihr ... Wer seid ... Ah. Bei dem Wappen klingelt etwas. Von Valancius. Nicht der einzigartige Gast, für den man Euch halten könnte."

languages.text: {n}Sarsılarak başını kaldıran kadın, hayata geri dönüp bakışlarını sana çeviriyor. Böyle perişan bir hâldeyken bile gözleri güven, keyif ve dirayetle parıldıyor.{/n} "Sen... Sen kim... Ah. Armanı tanıdım. Von Valancius. Seni gördüğüme şaşırmadım."
languages.original_text: {n}With a heavy jerk, the woman raises her head, emerging from oblivion, and focuses her gaze on you. Even in such a wretched state, her eyes still gleam with self-confidence, zest, and subtle shrewdness.{/n} "You... Who are... Ah. That coat of arms rings a bell. Von Valancius. I'm not as surprised to see you as you may think."
